SELECT sc.sc_id scid ,(SELECT companyname FROM CLIENT c WHERE c.cid =sc.cid) companyname ,sc_describe scdescribe ,(SELECT sd_name FROM servedetail sd WHERE sd.sd_id =sc.sd_id) sdname ,(SELECT uname FROM USER u WHERE u.uid=sc.uid) uname ,sc.Sc_settime time FROM serveclient sc ,serveallocation sa WHERE sc.sc_id = sa.sc_id AND sc_status=1 and sa.uid =?
